page.title: 19A Uyeasound Toddler.
page.content: My brother is the youngest person in Uyeasound. In the morning he wakes up between 7.00 and 7.30 and has a drink.He has his breakfast about 8.30, then he gets washed and dressed.He plays until he has lunch then he sometime has a sleep and plays again until tea-time between 5.00 and 6.30.Then he gets washed or bathed and goes to bed about 7.30.He has his nappy changed 8 times a day. These are things he does each week. On Monday he goes to Playschool.On Tuesday he goes shopping with Mum.On Wednesday he may go to Clinic or the Thrift Shop.On Thursday he goes swimming.On Friday he goes to Playschool again.On Saturday the whole family are home and where he goes depends on the weather and the jobs Mum and Dad have to do.
